=Welcome=

Welcome to the _!DelphiDabbler Component and Unit Library Wiki_.

The Library currently contains the following projects.

|| *Project* || *Description* ||
|| [AboutBoxComponent About Box Component] || Non-visual component that encapsulates an About Box. Set properties or link to a [VersionInformationComponent Version Information Component] to customise the about box content. ||
|| [DropFilesComponents Drop Files Components] || Components that enable applications to support drag and drop from Windows Explorer. ||
|| [ExStringPropertyEditor Extended String Property Editor] || Property editor that allows multi-line and long *string* and _TCaption_ properties to be edited. ||
|| [HKeyPropertyEditor HKEY Property Editor] || Property editor that allows registry root keys to be edited using symbolic constant names. ||
|| [ShellFoldersUnit Shell Folders Unit] || Components, classes and routines to assist in working with shell folders. Includes a "Browse for Folder" dialog box. ||
|| [StreamExtensionClasses Stream Extension Classes] || Classes that provide a means to wrap _TStream_ objects along with implementation of the _IStream_ interface.  ||
|| [SystemInformationUnit System Information Unit] || Static classes that get information about the user's computer and operating system.  ||
|| [VersionInformationComponent Version Information Component] || Component that accesses version information embedded in program files, DLLs etc. ||
|| [WindowStateComponents Window State Components] || Three components that save and restore window size, state and position using either, ini files, the registry or user-defined storage. ||

The library source code is stored in a !SubVersion repository. The repository structure is described [RepoStructure here].
